text: Yakhana ibrahima balalena, para'oyaradegara! E sthanake tumi santidhana kara ebam era adhibasidera madhye yara allaha o kiyamate bisbasa kare, taderake phalera dbara riyika dana kara. Balalenah yara abisbasa kare, ami tadera'o kichudina phayada bhoga karara suyoga deba, atahpara taderake balaprayoge doyakhera ayabe thele debo; seta nikrsta basasthana.
